Reviews.Title: Baby Monitor
Reviews.Author: Jim "Jim"
Reviews.Content: I use this in conjunction with my iPhone and iPad as our baby monitor.  This was actually my second in 2 years.  I thought the first one was so useful with our first child, that we went with the same camera for the second.

Reviews.Title: Wifi Issues
Reviews.Author: Jason Quint
Reviews.Content: Not sure exactly what the deal is but we can't connect to it on a regular basis, so i can't really use it as intended as a baby monitor. Not sure if the error is on our side with the wifi but seems to be spotty.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: We have had this camera for about a year now.  We use it with an app on our ipod touch and turn it in to a baby monitor.  Almost no problems with it for several months.  I think we had to reboot it one time.
